dares.text: Do 20 push-ups.
Run around the outside of the house once.
Do your best impersonation of someone in the room.
Let someone tickle you for 30 seconds.
Show the last photo you took on your phone.
Let someone write a word on your forehead in marker.
Try to lick your elbow.
Post an embarrassing status on social media.
Speak in an accent for the next 3 rounds.
Let the person to your left draw on your face with a pen.
Talk in a high-pitched voice until your next turn.
Text your crush and tell them you like them.
Eat a raw onion slice.
Let someone redo your hairstyle.
Dance with no music for 1 minute.
Wear socks on your hands for the next 10 minutes.
Imitate a celebrity until someone can guess who you are.
Exchange shirts with the person next to you.
Let someone send a text from your phone.
Eat a spoonful of mustard.
Try to juggle 3 items of the group’s choosing.
Do your best chicken dance outside on the lawn.
Read the last text you received out loud.
Let the group give you a new nickname and use it for the rest of the game.
Do 30 jumping jacks.
Let someone give you a makeover.
Eat a spoonful of hot sauce.
Pretend to be a waiter/waitress and take snack orders from everyone in the room.
Let the person next to you redo your profile picture.
Call a random contact and sing them a song.
Wear your clothes backward for the next hour.
Let the group choose a tattoo (fake) to draw on you.
Send a flirty message to someone you haven’t talked to in a while.
Try to do a magic trick.
Speak in rhymes for the next 3 rounds.
Let someone shave a part of your body.
Wear a blindfold for the next 10 minutes.
Hold someone’s hand for the next 5 minutes.
Eat a slice of lemon without making a face.
Let someone give you a back massage for 1 minute.
Do your best animal impression until someone guesses it.
Try to walk in a straight line with your eyes closed.
Let the group pick a song and dance to it without music.
Do an impression of someone until the group can guess who you are.
Act like a cat for the next 5 minutes.
Let the group paint your nails.
Let the group take a funny picture of you.
Talk like a baby for the next 3 rounds.
Try to lick your nose.
Let someone braid your hair.
Switch socks with someone in the room.
Wear sunglasses for the next 3 rounds.
Pretend to be a waiter/waitress and take snack orders from everyone in the room.
Try to make the group laugh as quickly as possible.
